posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Ed Foster, PSA 4.5, with a Piedmont back, that I am looking to sell.  Front and back scans are below.  $400.

Price includes delivery with signature confirmation.  Paypal fine with no additional surcharge.

Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like it!

Regards,
Adam

Foster with Old Mill back has now been sold ---- posting revised to show Piedmont backed Foster now for sale.
  
Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like it!
Bump for final price drop to $400.00
